column1: 产品结构：root->珠海泰芯半导体有限公司-产品应用

column4: Stable signal, easily covering 50000 square-meters of the Grand Manor, and once-charge for several-months use.

Can transmit for a long distance(500 meters), or penetrate multiple walls; can watch the baby status in real time, via screen and mobile phone at the same time; supports standby low power consumption with 100 hours.

column2: Wall Piercing King Wireless Wi-Fi Extender
column4: It works in the Sub-GHz band, supports TCP / IP Ethernet interface, can connect with the router, and realizes the long-distance point-to-point wireless bridging of the router, which complies with the latest 802.11ah standard issued by the Wi-Fi Alliance in 2016. At the same time, it has the characteristics of low power consumption, long communication distance, large amount of data transmission and strong anti-interference ability.
Worry free of Wi-Fi coverage, plug-and-play, no configuration, wireless monitoring, partition transmission
It can transmit HD video for one kilometer, or penetrate multiple walls, easily cover the Grand Manor for one kilometer.
The open distance can reach 800m, the standby current of door unit is down to 200uA, and the standby current of indoor unit is down to 3.5mA.
